titles.title: Diversifying Paths to Apprenticeships Act
Diversifying Paths to Apprenticeships Act
To amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act relating to adult education, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Diversifying Paths to Apprenticeships Act
This bill incorporates preparation for apprenticeship or pre-apprenticeship programs into the federal workforce development programs that provide adult education and English literacy and civics education.
